scripts.start: shx cp -f .env.staging .env && firebase use dev && react-scripts start
scripts.local: shx cp -f .env.dev .env && firebase use dev && react-scripts start
scripts.dev-local: rsync -h -P .env.local .env && firebase use dev && react-scripts start
scripts.start:production: shx cp -f .env.release .env && firebase use default && react-scripts start
scripts.build:dev: shx cp -f .env.dev .env && firebase use dev && react-scripts build
scripts.build:staging: shx cp -f .env.staging .env.production && firebase use dev && react-scripts build
scripts.build:production: shx cp -f .env.release .env.production && firebase use default && react-scripts build
scripts.deploy:staging: shx cp -f .env.staging .env.production && firebase use dev && react-scripts build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:production: shx cp -f .env.release .env.production && firebase use default && react-scripts build && firebase deploy
scripts.docker-build: cp .env.dev .env && firebase use dev && react-scripts build
scripts.docker-local: cp .env.dev .env && firebase use dev && firebase serve -p 5000 -o 0.0.0.0
